description.@en: My studies have taught me two things: how to intuit sorcery when I see it and all the ways to avoid it.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: At your option, you may substitute the Education Skill in place of Incantation. In addition, you may substitute Education in place of any Skill required to Resist against Spells.
